field.name: description
field.value:
If we configure Active Record to use the HybridWebThreadScopeInfo just like
<activerecord isWeb="true" threadinfotype="Castle.ActiveRecord.Framework.Scopes.HybridWebThreadScopeInfo, Castle.ActiveRecord" > ...
and also register the SessionScopeWebModule i httpmodules section of web.config, it will fail because of hard-coded expectation for WebThreadScopeInfo.
This patch introduces IWebThreadScopeInfo interface that is inherited from IThreadScopeInfo with no additional members. SessionScopeWebModule expects current thread scope info to implement this interface.
